code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec minimum_sum(n :: integer, k :: integer) :: integer
  def minimum_sum(n, k) do
    if n > div(k, 2) do
      over = n - div(k, 2)
      div(k, 2) * (div(k, 2) - 1) + over * k
    else
      n * (n + 1) div 2
    end
  end
end
